Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives
Ray Markey Files on the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930
Markey, Raymond
Markey, Raymond
WAG.286
8.5 Linear Feet 9 boxes
undated Materials are in English 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8
Scope and Content Note
This collection contains material pertaining to the history of the New York Public Library Guild Local 1930, AFSCME.
Arrangement
This collection has not been arranged by an archivist; materials are in the order in which they were received from the donor.
Immediate Source of Acquisition
Donated by Ray Markey in 2008. The accession number 2008.028 is associated with this collection.
Conditions Governing Use
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection, created by Ray Markey was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder.
Conditions Governing Access
Materials are open without restrictions.
Related Archival Materials
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930 Records (WAG 040)
American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930 Photographs (PHOTOS 017)
Preferred Citation
Identification of item, date; Ray Markey Files on the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees (AFSCME), Local 1930; WAG 286; box number; folder number; Tamiment Library/Robert F. Wagner Labor Archives, New York University.
Historical/Biographical Note
Raymond (Ray) Markey was the president of the New York Public Library Guild Local 1930, AFSCME from 1992 to 2004.
